transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Yeah, hello. Am I speaking with Harry here?
Speaker B: Pardon?
Speaker A: Am I speaking with Harry here?
Speaker B: So I can't hear you.
Speaker A: Yeah, am I speaking with Harry even here?
Speaker B: Can you speak up please?
Speaker A: Am I speaking with Harry here? Harry even. Yes, hello Harry, Dish up the site calling you from Ambus to.
Speaker B: Oh perfect.
Speaker A: I can see that you are looking to book a student accommodation for your university, correct?
Speaker B: Yeah, I am.
Speaker A: So I can see that you have already finalized Kings Cross London and that is for bronze on sweet 44 weeks, correct?
Speaker B: Yeah, great, perfect.
Speaker A: So just wanted to confirm if we can proceed ahead with the application now.
Speaker B: Yeah, please. Perfect, that'd be great.
Speaker A: Okay, so I'll do one thing here. Bronze on suit share upper level available at 583 pounds per week, correct?
Speaker B: Yeah, perfect.
Speaker A: So I'll do one thing here. I'll share you a booking form like I'll guide you step by step like what to do next and you can just let me know. And also there is a 5% of flash sale going on. So it means that whatever room that you will book the total price they will be levied at 5% of the.
Speaker B: Okay, great.
Speaker A: Okay, so I'll be connecting you on WhatsApp regarding what next step needs to be done because we need a booking form for you to fill and once we have your detail we will initiate the process by rm. Okay, yeah.
Speaker B: Thank you.
Speaker A: You're welcome. Have a great day. I'll be connecting you with on WhatsApp within five minutes. Okay.
Speaker B: Okay, great. Perfect. Thank you.
Speaker A: You're welcome. Have a great day. Cheers. Bye.
Speaker A: Is the Vodafone voicemail service for OH7.
